description: Duplicate a job production plan template into a new plan (or template).
permissions: User must be authorized to view the job production plan template (same permission as JobProductionPlan show).
side_effects: Creates a job production plan duplication; may create or update a derived job production plan and copy related records. If --is-async is set, creates a JobProductionPlanDuplicationWork item and schedules a background job to perform the duplication.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan-template is required. --start-on must be a YYYY-MM-DD date and is required when the template has job schedule shifts; for async duplications it is required unless --derived-job-production-plan-template-name is set. --start-on must be within the template start-on min/max when those bounds are defined. --derived-job-production-plan must reference a plan whose template matches --job-production-plan-template. --skipped-labor-requirements-overlapping-resource-ids and --skipped-labor-requirements-not-valid-to-assign-ids must be JSON arrays of [labor_requirement_id, resource_id] pairs. Unless --skip-template-duplication-validation is set, the template must be valid for duplication (invalid template relations cause validation errors).

flags.name: --job-production-plan-template
flags.description: Template job production plan ID (required). Example: 123.

flags.name: --derived-job-production-plan
flags.description: Derived job production plan ID (optional).

flags.name: --new-customer
flags.description: New customer ID (optional). Example: 456.

flags.name: --derived-job-production-plan-template-name
flags.description: Derived plan template name (optional).

flags.name: --start-on
flags.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional). Example: 2026-01-23.
flags.validation: Must be YYYY-MM-DD; required when the template has job schedule shifts and for async duplications unless --derived-job-production-plan-template-name is set.

flags.name: --skip-template-duplication-validation
flags.description: Skip template duplication validation checks.

flags.name: --disable-overlapping-crew-requirement-is-validating-overlapping
flags.description: Relax overlapping crew requirement validation.

flags.name: --is-async
flags.description: Create a duplication work item asynchronously.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-alarms
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan alarms.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-locations
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan locations.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-safety-risks
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan safety risks.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-material-sites
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan material sites.

flags.name: --skip-equipment-requirements
flags.description: Skip copying equipment requirements.

flags.name: --skip-labor-requirements
flags.description: Skip copying labor requirements.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-material-types
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan material types.

flags.description: Skip copying job production plan service type unit of measures.

flags.description: Skip copying job production plan display unit of measures.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-service-type-unit-of-measure-cohorts
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan service type unit of measure cohorts.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-trailer-classifications
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan trailer classifications.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-segment-sets

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-segments
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan segments.

flags.name: --skip-job-production-plan-subscriptions
flags.description: Skip copying job production plan subscriptions.

flags.description: Skip copying job production plan time card approvers.

flags.name: --skip-job-schedule-shifts

flags.description: Skip copying job production plan inspectors.
